sub_title: Productowner Reporting at wholesale ING Nederland
summary:
A result oriented, persistent and hard working team player with more than 20 years of experience and a client focused mind.

STRENGTHS
• Result orientation • Focus on customers
• Open and candid • Positive minded 
• Structured way of working

Project Manager or product owner in a wide variety of business services within the banking industry. As project manager particularly interested in projects which cover the whole area of the start up of a project to the closure of the project. As a product owner I feel most comfortable in the delivery of real commercial products. I am always interested in projects/environments which have to deal with both ICT and commercial aspects.

Specialties: information technology, operations, client services
payments, SEPA, PSD2
Prince II
